plot: An old man recounts the tale of his great-great-grandfather seeking revenge for his broken toy as Sir Isaac Newton struggles with not only the law of gravity, but the law of attraction.
title: Gravity's Pull
plot_es: An old man recounts the tale of his great-great-grandfather seeking revenge for his broken toy as Sir Isaac Newton struggles with not only the law of gravity, but the law of attraction.
plot_en: An old man recounts the tale of his great-great-grandfather seeking revenge for his broken toy as Sir Isaac Newton struggles with not only the law of gravity, but the law of attraction.
